dma.config.feature_toggle.windowResizabl: Set whether the game window size can be changed.
dma.config.feature_toggle.quickCraftWith: Holding Shift and clicking on a recipe item in the RecipeBook will craft all available items in your inventory into that item at once. This feature relies on the ItemScroller.
dma.config.feature_toggle.ignoreSpecNBTT: When using OMMC, ignore items with specified NBT tags when sorting items.
dma.config.lists.ignoreSpecNBTTagsList.c: Names of NBT tags to ignore when sorting. Items with tags of these names will be ignored.
